description.value: Calling on the power of Ugly Cute, you manifest hundreds of illusory, tiny stone spiders that swarm the target and stick to them with webs. When you Cast this Spell and each time you Sustain it, choose one creature within range. They must make a Will save. As these are phantasmal spiders, they can affect incorporeal creatures just the same as corporeal creatures. On a failure, they become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{immobilized} from the phantasmal webs for 1 round and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} on a critical failure). A creature immobilized from the spell may attempt to Escape on their turn, using your spell DC as the Escape DC. A target that critically succeeds at their saving throw becomes immune to phantasmal spiders for 1 minute.
